features: [Various and Controllable RGB] Three lighting modes on the fifine USB microphone show you up to 9 kinds of RGB light colors. Worked with RGB stream mic, the RGB control button gives you an easy way to select mode or color to make a difference for game scenes. Aesthetic of the gaming microphone for PC works well to your gamer setup or LED equipment to present pop and visual pleasant.

[Intuitive Mic Control] 3.5mm headphones jack on the PC microphone allows to monitor if your audio is too quiet or harsh on streaming or Youtube video. You can operate the gain knob instead of MacBook or computer hotkeys to adjust mic volume up to real-time feedback. You can mute the streaming mic with one tap to avoid sneezing into a mess in game chat room.

[Clear Sound Quality] Condenser mic capsule brings smooth sound with better sensitivity, capturing the vocal voice greatly even soft sound. Cardioid pickup pattern worked with the gaming PC mic reduces most fan or vent noises from your PC tower. The streaming microphone for PC gaming keeps obvious improved sound quality and accurate online chatting with gaming teammates in Discord or Twitch.

[Noise Reduction] Skip hassle to cut back noises. PC gaming mic with external black metal pop filter softens plosives with B, P, T and more. That compact anti-vibration shock mount on computer microphone USB dampens vibration from keyboard or your hand touching desktop or laptop. Practical accessories clean unpleasant noises from your podcasting for more energetic sound.

[Simple to Use] The standing gaming mic for video recording is plug-and-play for PC/Mac/computer/PS4/PS5, which is easily for home use, zoom meeting even if you are not a technically inclined individual. The base stand is quite solid, so the PC mic for gaming will not be easily knocked over. You can adjust the RGB mic thumbscrew if necessary to get a better recording position.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Gaming Streaming USB Microphone FIFINE AmpliGame A8-PC Gaming Desktop Microphone A8 is born for gaming streaming. Three kinds of optional RGB modes on the PC microphone is a boon for the gamer. Tap-to-mute, gain knob and monitoring headphones jack are integrated in the computer gaming microphone instead of quitting out full-screen games. Condenser microphone delivers rich and authentic voice for warmer game voice or interactive streaming. Pop filter and shock mount work together to reduce mechanical noise. Compatible with computers and PS4/PS5, meets more needs for players. A8 RGB Light Display Gamer Streamer Mic with Controllable RGB A8 gaming microphone featured three RGB modes, including two dynamic modes and static color option. RGB control key provides on/off/selection, and gives you more freedom to choose. Get a color coordinate with your game space to present visual pleasure to your audience. Set it as a Cyberpunk or FPS theme color for a pop aesthetic feeling. RGB memory function saves the your time to select the color theme again next time, and you can get the active light immediately.

RGB Control for On/Off/Selection Several colors can be choose from. Multiple RGB Lighting Each color really brings the mic alive. Pick the RGB up to Your Preference Matches the colors of your PC for amazing synergy.

Condenser Cardioid Microphone Condenser gaming microphone does not muddy the sound, but improve sound sensitivity and smoothness. Open and smooth voice brings frequent communication and interactive live streaming. Cardioid pattern minimizes ambient background noise to accurately highlights the details of your voice. Gaming Partner The pop filter made of metal prevents gusty letters like "bpfs" in the air from being captured. The compact rubber bands on shock mount enhance ability of vibration isolation to reduce the tinny noise. Dual accessories work together to ensure pops and distorted sound away from your recording.
Boost interaction with audience in your streaming. Less keyboard noise could be hear in game voice. Sounds like just right next to your teammates. Adds super cool visual element to your desk.

Multipurpose Gaming Mic USB Condenser Mic Mic Capsule USB Condenser Mic Cardioid Polar Pattern Cardioid RGB On/Off/Change Color RGB Button / Headphones Jack Tap-to-Mute Gain Knob USB Condenser Mic Mic Capsule XLR/USB Dynamic Mic Cardioid Polar Pattern Cardioid RGB On/Off/Change Color RGB Button On/Off/Change Color Headphones Jack Tap-to-Mute Gain Knob USB Condenser Mic Mic Capsule USB Condenser Mic Cardioid Polar Pattern Four Pickup Pattern RGB On/Off/Change Color RGB Button On/Off/Change Color Headphones Jack Tap-to-Mute Gain Knob USB Condenser Mic Mic Capsule USB Dynamic Mic Cardioid Polar Pattern Cardioid RGB On/Off/Change Color RGB Button On/Off Headphones Jack Tap-to-Mute Gain Knob

Is it possible to choose the RGB light color? You can tap the RGB button to change the RGB light color, and you can long press the RGB button for 3 seconds to turn on/off the RGB light. How can I pick up the sound loudly and clearly? Adjust the gain to a proper level as you need by mic gain knob or sound settings. Suggseted speak in the front of the USB gaming microphone within 6-12 inches. If possible, please use the mic in a quiet room or space. Is A8 mic compatible with Xbox and PS5? This USB gaming microphone is NOT compatible with Xbox, but it works well with PS4/PS5, PC, laptop. Can A8 mic work with Macbook? This USB gaming microphone can work with Macbook, you can plug the mic in Macbook and go to "system preference"-"Sound"-click "Input" and set "Fifine Microphone" as default input device. How can I monitor my voice? Plug the headphones into the 3.5mm headphone jack on the gaming microphone. Set the mic as default input and output device to monitor your voice in real time. You can refer to Fifine H8 headphones (ASIN: B0B6BPVS3Z), fit for real-time monitoring.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Honestly, love this dude.
reviews.reviewText: I am an avid buyer of affordable tech.I have bought $10 webcams, $15 mice, $20 headsets, $15 capture cards, and *several* mics in the $50 and below range.So when I say that for the price, this mic absolutely blows anything I've ever bought as a budget streamer and tech user outta the water? That's not a lie.This mic is affordable and pretty easy to set-up. It comes mounted onto a mic stand that is pretty mediocre all things considered, but was easy to unscrew and mount onto a boom arm. It sounds great.I know very little about sound mixing, so being able to pop this bad boy in my computer and doing minimal to edit how it sounds is pretty rad in my personal opinion. It sounds great out of the box.Like most mics, it does pick up on some background noise. This can easily be fixed with a noise gate. The mic picks up on my typing- even connected to a boom mic and with a noise gate on- but it's perfectly alright and not at all an issue!I love it.It has touch buttons that are very easy to use, and the volume gain nob is alright. I will say that I find the light button being a touch button in the location that it's at (towards the bottom back of the mic) is a little inconvenient for when one moves a mic back and forth on a boom arm, but it's not really that much of a trouble. The push to mute is really rad, and the colour types are pretty sick as well.I would buy from this brand again! :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Microphone Ever!
reviews.reviewText: You always hear about Yeti and all these other fancy-schmancy microphones that cost an arm and a leg. Well, not everyone can afford that. As someone who was using a little $20 costco rocket microphone, I can tell you my audio is EXPONENTIALLY better with this Fifine. You don’t even need filters, itself all fantastic as is. And it’s a really good price! Was definitely worth the purchase and I would buy it again, if ever I had to, in a heartbeat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Crisp audio quality at such an affordable proce
reviews.reviewText: If you’re on a budget and want a high quality mic, this is the one! It’s easy to use and setup, great price for some crisp audio!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Really good mic for a fair price
reviews.reviewText: I mean what is there to say... I like it! It sounds natural and clean. What I DON'T like is how the volume knob is on the back so it's annoying to have to turn it but overall pretty solid mic. Nice wide variety of SET (As in you CAN'T customize) RGB light. One of the various color combos are bound to fit your setup aesthetic! I always had mine on blue cuz that's my favorite color!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic budget microphone that sounds great.
reviews.reviewText: Not an audiophile or has any real experience with mics or setups. I originally got a T669 in 2020 based on all the positive reviews and that was a solid solid solid microphone that I was really happy with except primarily the lack of mute button and how much background noise it picked up. I didn't need to upgrade, but I was in the mood to try this out and I got it for a great price so the decision was made easier.Overall sound-wise, I think it's really similar sounding to the T669. I would have liked a little more low end tones picked up, but it sounds clear throughout the range. I think people who know their way around mics probably could get it to sound even better, but it's plenty good enough for my untrained ear. The biggest upgrade was the improvement in background noise. I tried both mics in Audacity and it's a noticeable difference in background noise. I liked the fact that I could just pop it onto the mic arm that came with the T669 and the RGB lights are awesome. It provides some cool ambience as I'm just working on my computer. It's great to be able to switch off the lights too, or have them shut off with the computer as well. I like how the smiley face isn't really all that noticeable on the pop filter - which looks and works great.The only beefs I have with it are that the shock mount is pretty huge - I miss the compactness of the T669. This mic is already bigger before you consider the shock mount. The other gripes are that the gain knob is on the rear when it could easily have been in the same position on the front. You can operate it based on feel, but it just makes more sense to have it on the front - which frees up the rear to have the USB connector to go out the rear of the mic for a cleaner look. I also would have preferred a little less sound pickup from the rear of the mic. I sometimes forget to mute the mic when gaming until I notice that it's picking up my speakers.But those are minor things. This is a mic with plenty of bells and whistles for the price tag and it amps up the fun level if you ever need to voice chat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: this mic is great, the sound quality is really good. The gain knob and mic mute button are so helpful. From using my last mic that didn’t have a mute button, this one works great and I don’t have to tap it hard at all for it to work.The only thing I don’t like is the rgb light patterns, it’d be cool if they were customizable or if you could pause them on a certain color (that’d be awesome). And the solid colors are nice but I wish there were maybe a few more or just better shades of the current ones.For example, a purple color (rather than only a pinkish magenta) would be amazing, or a yellow that’s actually more yellow than green.But I just don’t use the rgb anymore on it though since they wont match anything else on my setup.
